left.text: i want to put everyone out of business. start the gift-economy. systematically execute all homosexuals

right.text: all i have to call it is freedom.  never been tried before

left.text: so what, everyone just sits around all the time

right.text: there's no government like no government! we can govern ourselves

left.text: it's been tried before. Fourier Phalanxes, Hippie Communes, fucking... Thoreau got sick of it after a year and a half
